credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Sailor with a Banner
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Man dressed in Russian Navy outfit, leaning on post and holding rope in left hand, holding large red banner in right; his right leg raised on ledge, his head turned slightly to his left. Inscription on his hat brim (in Russian) "Baltic Fleet."
name: Figure
